name: The Rose & Rhino
description:
In a world of cute demon girls, the demon Marbas holds domain over all things disease. In an effort to increase productivity and defeat her greatest rival Andromalius, she's began rubberstamping every wild new idea that reaches her desk, no matter how monumental or insignificant the project seems. (What's the worst that can happen? More disease?) Located on the site of an unstable heaven-earth rift, six succubi find work in a small and cozy maid cafe called The Rose & Rhino, where it's not just pastries and smiles on the menu...

In this game jam edition, the tutorial and one repeatable semi-random level can be played. This game contains themes of consensual and nonconsensual pathogen contagion, so play with discretion.

known bugs:

  • if there's a regular object in your inventory before an empty or undecorated cup, trying to fill or decorate said cup does nothing. empty inventory spaces don't cause this problem. i tried to fix this thrice and every attempt only made it worse. i'm working on it
  • you can do things during dialogue. temporary solution: please dont do things during dialogue
  • greenside plates should give contamination points
  • executable is called 'sb23' 

update priorities:

  • sound effects
  • queue stop button
  • queue indicator bubbles
  • levels ending properly
  • reduce request rate of combo drinks

not tested on Mac or Linux, if you try it out please tell me how it goes for you
